title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Torrent-Trail, Switzerland
content:
Photo submitted by Ben Strebel, “A colourful day in the Swiss Alps. This shot was taken on the Torrent-Trail in canton Wallis.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Torrent-Trail, Switzerland appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
